articles.content: Body of Work is a feelgood show, Hannah Gadsby tells us. Its predecessors, the smash hits Nanette and Douglas, shot the Tasmanian to stardom but werent all smiles. Her latest, recounting romance and … [+2010 chars]

articles.title: Multi-millionaire, 51, is 'waiving his right to divorce' his FOURTH wife - Daily Mail
articles.description: Infamous for announcing love was 'invented by poor people' Brandon Wade, 51, from Las Vegas, met student Dana Rosewall, 21, at the end of 2020, through his site. SeekingArrangement.

articles.title: International Booker prize announces longlist ‘tracing ring around the world’ - The Guardian
articles.description: The 13 books in contention for the £50,000 prize include Tomb of Sand by Geetanjali Shree, the first book translated from Hindi to be nominated
articles.content: Tomb of Sand by Indian writer Geetanjali Shree has become the first book translated from Hindi to be nominated for the International Booker prize. The judges praised the loud and irresistible tale of… [+4466 chars]

articles.title: Buffy at 25: Joss Whedon may have tainted the show’s legacy – but us fans have made the series our own - The Independent
articles.description: As ‘Buffy the Vampire Slayer’ celebrates its 25th anniversary, Leila Latif reflects on what the series means to those who adore it
